\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	{X \otimes ^{\mathbf{L}} (Y \otimes ^{\mathbf{L}}Z)} \& {\rho X \otimes (Y \otimes ^{\mathbf{L}}Z)} \& {\rho X \otimes  (Y \otimes \rho Z)} \\
	{(X \otimes ^{\mathbf{L}}Y) \otimes ^{\mathbf{L}}Z} \& {(X \otimes ^{\mathbf{L}}Y) \otimes \rho Z} \& {(\rho X \otimes  Y) \otimes \rho Z}
	\arrow["{\alpha ^D}"', dashed, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=1-1]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{\alpha }", from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\simeq"', draw=none, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-1]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=2-2]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
